triples.name: Theory of computation
triples.relevance: STOC is the premier conference for presenting papers on theoretical computer science and the theory of computation.

triples.name: Symposium on Theory of Computing
triples.relevance: This proceedings volume contains papers presented at the 55th Annual ACM Symposium on Theory of Computing.

triples.name: Computational complexity theory
triples.relevance: Computational complexity is a major research area covered by papers at STOC.

triples.name: Algorithm
triples.relevance: Algorithm design and analysis is a core topic in the theory of computation and STOC research.

triples.name: Association for Computing Machinery
triples.relevance: The ACM sponsors and organizes the STOC conference and publishes these proceedings.
